body: The whole thing through the end, the wife is getting threesomed frequently lmao.
Shit were short 140 pages till the end
I'm really getting into this series, when will the rest of the series be translated into English.  I can't read Japanese, I really like the art style of the women in this series.

This makes me feel like the husband deserves to be cucked for selfishly sending his wife off to dangerous situations for the sake of his "dreams". He should've long stopped throwing his wife out there right after the hotel incident where the man "almost" (what the husband thinks) penetrated her. A normal person would've tried to not send his wife out for the stupid "information gathering" right after that incident for fear of such incidents from happening again. But no, the husband just chalks it up as unlucky and continues throwing his wife out there for the sake of his "dreams". All these makes me feel like he DESERVES being cucked.
e bom pena que e ntr pra mim ntr e um negócio estranho mas eu recomendo
This author is so freaking annoying. He really expects us to suspend disbelief WAY too much. Passing him up from now on.
I know it's porn but if you want to make the husband this stupid just make him normal salary man instead of detective LMAO, his too dumb to become a detective.

I understood the meaning of this. But at the same time. This is pure garbage in some degree. Now in every event that happens.  The author just gave bad karma to the husband. Reality the wife won't have go this low and started to be a slut in the end.  This isn't ntr but it just a massive pit of unnecessary.
Playing with fire and fell into it. Author meant for that I guess. But pretty bad to read last pages.

I tried to keep reading till the end even after the ntr but you dare ntr a black haired glassed beauty with a good personality for no reason? Fuck you author.
